      level - the wanted level
      Returns:

      Save a grid to an XML Document and edit the document to keep a coherent file
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid to be saved
      startLevel - the starting level index
      endLevel - the ending level index
      isDefault - is the grid the default one

    • constructMapNode

      Create an XML Node from a grid
      Parameters:
      document - the XML document used to create the node
      grid - the grid to be converted
      startLevel - the starting level index
      endLevel - the ending level index
      defaultMap - is this grid the default one
      Returns:
      an XML Node representing the grid
